item.title: 法国投票和中国贸易争端为欧洲企业盈利蒙上阴影
item.description: 投资者表示，法国政局的不确定性以及欧盟与中国的贸易争端给欧洲企业的盈利蒙上了一层阴影，尽管有预测称企业将取得更好的业绩。【原文：French political uncertainty and an EU trade spat with China are casting a shadow over European corporate earnings, investors say, despite forecasts that companies are set to deliver better results.】

item.title: 杰富瑞称英美煤炭大火可能影响煤炭销售
item.description: 经纪商杰富瑞（Jefferies）周一在一份报告中称，英美资源集团在澳大利亚的格罗夫纳冶金煤矿发生的火灾可能会对其澳大利亚冶金煤业务产生负面影响。【原文：A fire at Anglo American's Grosvenor metallurgical coal mine in Australia is likely to negatively affect its Australian met coal business, broker Jefferies said in a note on Monday.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：欧盟就 "付费或同意 "指控 Meta
item.description: 据《金融时报》周一报道，欧盟将指控 Facebook 母公司 Meta 违反了该集团具有里程碑意义的数字规则。【原文：The European Union is set to charge Facebook parent Meta with breaking the bloc's landmark digital rules, the Financial Times reported on Monday.】

item.title: 德国商报》称赛诺菲计划在德国投资 16 亿美元
item.description: 据德国《商报》周一报道，法国制药商赛诺菲即将决定在德国法兰克福的一个主要生产基地投资 13 亿至 15 亿欧元（14 亿至 16 亿美元），用于生产胰岛素品牌 Lantus。【原文：French drugmaker Sanofi is nearing a decision to invest between 1.3 billion euros and 1.5 billion euros ($1.4-$1.6 billion) at a major production site in Frankfurt, Germany, where it makes insulin brand Lantus, newspaper Handelsblatt reported on Monday.】

item.title: 西捷航空工会与航空公司达成协议后结束罢工
item.description: 代表加拿大西捷航空公司（WestJet Airlines）罢工机械师的工会周一表示，该工会已与航空公司谈判达成一份合同，立即结束了他们的罢工。【原文：The union representing Canada's WestJet Airlines' striking mechanics said on Monday that it has negotiated a contract with the carrier, ending their strike immediately.】

item.title: 空客称将根据 Spirit Aero 交易获得 5.59 亿美元赔偿
item.description: 欧洲空中客车公司（Airbus）周一公布了其计划收购精神航空系统公司（Spirit AeroSystems）某些亏损业务的条款，这是空中客车公司与竞争对手波音公司（Boeing）计划在更大范围内拆分供应商的一部分。【原文：Europe's Airbus on Monday set out the terms under which it plans to buy certain loss-making activities of Spirit AeroSystems as part of a planned wider break-up of the supplier between Airbus and rival Boeing .】

item.title: 波音重启向中国交付新飞机的计划
item.description: 根据飞行跟踪数据和两个消息来源，波音公司已经重新启动了最近几周因中国监管审查而停止的对华宽体喷气机交付，该审查也使美国飞机制造商新的窄体喷气机交付陷入停滞。【原文：Boeing has restarted wide-body jet deliveries to China that were halted in recent weeks due to a Chinese regulatory review which also stalled new narrow-body deliveries by the U.S. planemaker, according to flight tracking data and two sources.】

item.title: 早间竞标欧元走强和法国的马匹交易
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: 经过数月谈判，波音公司将以 47 亿美元收购 Spirit Aero 航空公司
item.description: 波音公司周一表示，将以 47 亿美元的全股票价格收购其陷入困境的供应商 Spirit AeroSystems，该交易经过数月谈判后最终敲定。【原文：Boeing said on Monday it would buy its struggling supplier Spirit AeroSystems in a $4.7 billion all-stock deal which was finalized after months of talks, as the aerospace giant tries to solve a full-blown safety and regulatory crisis that has engulfed its key supplier as well.】

item.title: 全球经济 全球需求稳健，6 月亚洲工厂活动扩大
item.description: 周一的调查显示，由于全球经济发展势头稳健，半导体产出前景光明，亚洲工厂活动在6月份有所扩大，这给政策制定者带来了一些希望，使亚洲能够抵御中国需求疲软带来的冲击。【原文：Asia's factory activity expanded in June on solid momentum in the global economy and brightening prospects for semiconductor output, surveys showed on Monday, offering policymakers some hope the region can weather the hit from soft Chinese demand.】

item.title: 税务局称日本地价上涨速度为 2010 年以来最快
item.description: 日本税务局周一表示，2023 年日本地价的上涨速度是 2010 年有可比数据以来最快的，这表明日本在冠状病毒大流行后，在旅游业蓬勃发展的帮助下，经济复苏步伐加快。【原文：Japan's land prices in 2023 rose at the fastest pace since comparable data available in 2010, the tax agency said on Monday, suggesting a recovery gathered pace helped by brisk tourism after the coronavirus pandemic.】

item.title: 财新制造业采购经理人指数显示中国工厂活动以逾三年来最快速度增长
item.description: 周一的一项私营部门调查显示，中国制造业活动因生产增长而创下三年多来的最快增速，即使需求增长放缓也是如此。【原文：China's manufacturing activity grew at the fastest pace in more than three years due to production gains, even as demand growth slowed, a private sector survey showed on Monday, indicating the health of the sector remained robust.】

item.title: 澳新银行-英迪德数据显示，澳大利亚 6 月份招聘广告下降 2.2
item.description: 周一的数据显示，澳大利亚6月份的招聘广告连续第五个月下降，原因是在高利率和经济放缓的情况下，劳动力需求继续放缓。【原文：Australian job advertisements fell for a fifth straight month in June, data showed on Monday, as labour demand continued to ease in the face of high interest rates and a slowing economy.】

item.title: 法国首轮投票后亚洲股市下跌，欧元上涨
item.description: 周一，亚洲股市低迷，交易员们在思考美国利率前景，而欧元则在极右翼在法国第一轮震撼性临时选举中赢得的选票比一些民调预测的要少之后走高。【原文：Asian stocks were subdued on Monday as traders pondered the U.S rates outlook, while the euro edged higher after the far-right won a smaller share of the vote in the first round of France's shock snap election than some polls had projected.】

item.title: 贝莱德将以 32 亿美元收购英国数据集团 Preqin
item.description: 贝莱德同意以 25.5 亿英镑（32.3 亿美元）的现金收购英国数据公司 Preqin，这是全球最大的资产管理公司向私人市场数据领域的一次扩张。【原文：BlackRock has agreed to buy UK data firm Preqin for 2.55 billion pounds ($3.23 billion) in cash in an expansion by the world's biggest asset management company into the private markets data segment.】

item.title: 夏季需求前景看好，石油价格走高
item.description: 受夏季燃料消费高峰和欧佩克+第三季度减产导致供应短缺的预测支撑，油价在周一早盘上扬，不过全球经济逆风和非欧佩克+产量上升抑制了涨幅。【原文：Oil prices edged up in early trade on Monday, supported by forecasts of a supply deficit stemming from peak summer fuel consumption and OPEC+ cuts in the third quarter, although global economic headwinds and rising non-OPEC+ output capped gains.】

item.title: 法国首轮投票后欧元上涨，日元走势艰难
item.description: 欧元周一上涨，原因是法国第一轮临时大选中极右翼占据了绝对优势，尽管优势小于预期；日本第一季度经济增长数据被下调，导致日元走低。【原文：The euro rose on Monday after the first round of France's snap election put the far-right in pole position, though by a smaller margin than projected, while a downgrade to Japan's first-quarter growth figures knocked the yen lower.】

item.title: 需求增长，韩国工厂活动实现 26 个月来最快增长
item.description: 周一的一项私营部门调查显示，由于全球需求改善，新订单猛增，韩国 6 月份的工厂活动增长加快，达到 26 个月以来的最快速度。【原文：South Korea's factory activity growth quickened in June to the fastest in 26 months, as new orders jumped on improving global demand, a private-sector survey showed on Monday.】

item.title: 日本 6 月制造业采购经理人指数（PMI）显示，日本 6 月工厂活动在成本上升的情况下保持不变
item.description: 周一的一项私营部门调查显示，日本 6 月份的工厂活动保持不变，原因是需求低迷，以及企业在日元疲软导致成本上升的情况下苦苦挣扎。【原文：Japan's factory activity stayed unchanged in June, a private-sector survey showed on Monday, amid lacklustre demand and as companies struggled with rising costs due to the weak yen.】

item.title: 韩国 6 月出口连续第九个月增长，但不及预期
item.description: 由于对芯片的强劲需求继续引领亚洲第四大经济体的出口复苏，韩国 6 月份出口连续第九个月增长，尽管增速低于分析师的预期。【原文：South Korea's exports increased for a ninth month in June, albeit at a slower pace than seen by analysts, as robust demand for chips continue to lead the export recovery in Asia's fourth-largest economy.】

item.title: 日本央行油当量调查显示，日本大型制造商情绪改善，创两年新高
item.description: 日本央行密切关注的一项调查显示，日本大型制造商的信心在截至 6 月份的三个月内有所增强，达到了两年来从未有过的水平。【原文：Confidence among big Japanese manufacturers improved in the three months to June to reach levels unseen in two years, a closely-watched survey central bank showed, backing up on its view the economy is on track for a moderate recovery.】

item.title: 受建筑业数据修正影响，日本将第一季度国内生产总值年率下调至下降 2.9
item.description: 日本政府周一对国内生产总值（GDP）数据进行了罕见的意外修正，称日本第一季度经济萎缩程度超出预期，这使脆弱的经济复苏前景变得暗淡。【原文：Japan's economy shrank more than expected in the first quarter, the government said in a rare unscheduled revision to gross domestic product (GDP) data on Monday, darkening prospects for a fragile recovery.】

item.title: 报告称，随着企业提高安全性，网络保险费率下降
item.description: 经纪商豪顿（Howden）在周一的一份报告中称，随着企业越来越善于遏制网络犯罪造成的损失，全球网络保险保费正在下降，尽管勒索软件攻击正在上升。【原文：Cyber insurance premiums are falling globally as businesses become more adept in curbing their losses from cyber crime, even as ransomware attacks are rising, broker Howden said in a report on Monday.】

item.title: 报告称 7 月份财产巨灾再保险费率下降
item.description: 再保险经纪公司盖伊-卡彭特（Guy Carpenter）周一表示，7 月份全球财产巨灾再保险费率有的保持不变，有的则下降了 "中至高个位数 "百分比。【原文：Global property catastrophe reinsurance rates ranged from being unchanged to falling by "mid- to high-single-digit" percentages in July, reinsurance broker Guy Carpenter said on Monday, following years of rising rates.】

item.title: 早间新闻新季度，老样子：中国采购经理人指数
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称波音公司同意以每股 37.25 美元的价格收购 Spirit Aero 公司
item.description: 据两位熟悉此事的消息人士透露，波音公司周日同意以每股 37.25 美元的价格收购 Spirit Aerosystems 公司，这笔全股票交易对该供应商的估值超过 40 亿美元。【原文：Boeing agreed on Sunday to acquire Spirit Aerosystems for $37.25 per share, in an all-stock deal that values the supplier at more than $4 billion, according to two sources familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 独家新闻消息人士称，美国要求波音公司就致命空难认罪
item.description: 两位熟悉此事的人士周日表示，美国司法部在发现波音公司违反了2018年和2019年737 MAX致命坠机事故的和解协议后，正在推动波音公司承认一项刑事指控，该事故造成346人死亡。【原文：The U.S. Justice Department is pushing for Boeing to plead guilty to a criminal charge after finding the planemaker violated a settlement over fatal 737 MAX crashes in 2018 and 2019 that killed 346 people, two people familiar with the matter said on Sunday.】

item.title: 疯狂动物城 2》全球票房突破 10 亿美元
item.description: 华特迪士尼公司（Walt Disney Co）周日表示，皮克斯电影《飞屋环游记 2》（Inside Out 2）上映不到三周，全球票房就突破了 10 亿美元大关，是历史上所有动画电影中最快达到这一水平的。【原文：Pixar movie "Inside Out 2" has crossed the $1 billion mark at the worldwide box office in less than three weeks of release, reaching that level in the fastest time of any animated film in history, Walt Disney Co said on Sunday.】

item.title: 德意志银行任命劳拉-帕多瓦尼为管理委员会成员
item.description: 德意志银行周日表示，它将任命劳拉-帕多瓦尼（Laura Padovani）为管理委员会成员，负责合规和预防金融犯罪，从而为这家男性占主导地位的德国银行高层增添了一名女性。【原文：Deutsche Bank said on Sunday that it was appointing Laura Padovani to the management board responsible for compliance and for preventing financial crime, adding a woman to the German lender's male-dominated top ranks.】

item.title: 媒体报道：阿托斯与债权人就重组达成原则性协议
item.description: 法国商业报纸《回声报》（Les Echos）周日称，法国技术公司阿托斯（ATOS.PA）一夜之间与债权人达成了债务重组原则协议。【原文：French technology company Atos (ATOS.PA) reached an agreement in principle with its creditors overnight to restructure its debt, French business newspaper Les Echos said on Sunday.】
